entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 in the morning. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
